name: Asopao
keywords: chicken, chorizo, rice, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, main course
recipeIngredient: 6 leg-thigh pieces of chicken, skinned and cut apart
1 green pepper, seeded and chopped coarse
1/4 teaspoon ground cumin, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put chicken, onion, garlic, green pepper, tomatoes, chorizos, bay leaf, water, oregano, cumin, salt and pepper into a pot. Bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add rice to pot, boil again and simmer, covered, until rice is tender and the dish has the consistency of a thick soup, about 15 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately.
